Job Description:
What s exciting about this role:

This position will be in the development of new capabilities that accelerate the design of innovative electronics products that will be deployed in 2020 and later. The candidate will be exposed to applications ranging from Artificial Intelligence,  Machine Learning,  far space technologies,  processors,  high- performance computing and automotive networks.

The candidate will be responsible for deploying new features for the VisualSim GUI; designing,  coding,  and debugging applications to develop high- quality and well- architect software; developing debugging and animation tools for VisualSim Architect and VisualSim Explorer to support electronic design workflows; providing innovative ways to capture the representation of task graphs,  integrate with SysML and developing APIs for third parties to integrate into VisualSim; leveraging state- of- the- art web UI technologies to enable building modern applications; engaging in all aspects of software development processes,  influencing requirements specifications,  conducting design reviews,  and generating innovative software design solutions; working closely with other developers,  quality engineers,  UX specialists,  and visual designers; and performing functional design,  architecture development,  and implementation of APIs and UIs using Java,  JavaScript,  HTML,  and CSS.

Location: 

Our top preference is to have this Developer in the Chennai,  India Metro area.

Education and Experience:

Master s degree or higher (or foreign education equivalent) in Engineering,  Computer Science,  Information Technology,  Computer Science and Engineering,  Systems Science,  or Operations Research and no experience.

OR

Bachelor s degree (or foreign education equivalent) in Engineering,  Computer Science,  Information Technology,  Computer Science and Engineering,  Systems Science,  or Operations Research and two+ (2+) years of experience in job offered or two+ (2+) years of experience in UI design.

Special Requirements:

2+ years software development experience

Proficient in Java (or similar Object- Oriented language e.g. C#,  C++)

Experience developing Swing (or similar code- behind GUI frameworks)

Demonstrated expertise in object oriented programming using Java

Demonstrated expertise in UI design and testing using Java; and integrating UI components in a text editing environment.

Excellent communication skills

Strong analytical and creative problem solving skills

BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area[Expertise may be gained during Graduate program.]

Why ELC Labs

It s the chance to collaborate with bright,  passionate people. It s contributing to software products that make a difference in the world. And it s being part of a company with an incredible commitment to doing the right thing for each individual,  our customers,  and the local community.

ELC Labs is the development arm of Mirabilis Design,  the sole provider of architecture exploration software for the worldwide electronics industry. ELC Labs is based in Chennai India and Mirabilis Design is based in Sunnyvale,  California,  USA with over 65 customers worldwide. Mirabilis Design is privately held and has been profitable every year since its founding in 2003.
